name: Alien Space Shooting 18
description:
Alien Space Shooting 18 is under attack of space intruders and the alien shooters. They destroyed all of squadron. You are last hero of galaxy and will be faced an alien shooter. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the galaxy from its alien enemies.
FEATURE
- Amazing lighting and special effects
- Includes Power-ups and Bosses!
- Leader board global.
- Lucky circle.
